subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Matt Kenseth reached the Nascar Nationwide Series victory circle for the first time in nearly a year, passing Jeff Burton for the lead on Lap 186 of the Nicorette 300 at Atlanta Motor Speedway in Hampton, Ga. The race was extended three laps beyond its scheduled 195 laps because of a three-car crash.
